abstract: All relevant ethical guidelines have been followed; any necessary IRB and/or ethics committee approvals have been obtained and details of the IRB/oversight body are included in the manuscript.
author: Zhiyun Zang; Zi Li; Xueli Zhou; Xiaofang Wu; Xiaoxiao Xia; Li Pu
title: Comparison of psychological distress and demand induced by COVID-19 during the lockdown period in patients undergoing peritoneal dialysis and hemodialysis: a cross-section study in a tertiary hospital

funding.funding-statement: There are no funding sources to declare.
